Subject: Starting Heritrix with Eclipse

Sorry for my newbie question- I am attempting to modify Heritrix 
(obtained from heritrix-1.9.0-200607171747-src.tar.gz) using Eclipse 
3.1.  I've successfully imported and re-built Heritrix, but now I'm 
wondering how to get it to run.

I saw in the developer's manual the bit about setting the 
'heritrix.development' property, but it's not clear as to where this 
property should be set.  Can I still use the 
~/heritrix-1.9.0-200607171747/src/scripts/heritrix script to start up 
Heritrix without having to make major modifications due to the fact that 
files are in different locations?

I'm rather new to Eclipse, so please bear with me.

Thanks,
Frank
